actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Assistant Secretary for Mental Health and Substance Use, to award grants to States, territories, political subdivisions of States and territories, Tribal governments, and consortia of Tribal governments to establish an unarmed 911 response program, and for other purposes.
short_title: 911 Diversion to Unarmed Personnel Act of 2020
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care
Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

titles.title: 911 Diversion to Unarmed Personnel Act of 2020
911 Diversion to Unarmed Personnel Act of 2020

To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Assistant Secretary for Mental Health and Substance Use, to award grants to States, territories, political subdivisions of States and territories, Tribal governments, and consortia of Tribal governments to establish an unarmed 911 response program, and for other purposes.
